pages.title: How?
pages.text: Sand can be held in place by one of two methods.$(br2)1. By using an 'Energetic Slab' above it, up to 6 sand blocks below it.$(br)2. by Turning it into solidified Sand in a camp fire

pages.title: Energetic Sand
pages.text: Valid Slabs that can be made into Energetic Slabs$(br2)-Chiseled SandStone Slabs$(br)-Cut SandStone Slabs$(br)-Sand Slabs(made from Solidified Sand)$(br)-SandStone Slabs$(br)-Smooth SandStone Slabs

pages.title: Gravity Defying Sand
pages.text: Acts like any other block that does not fall, while keeping sand particles.
